channel.title: -Xmx500m error
channel.description:
I have just downloaded a server and I've run into some problems.
In this one I go to: [b]64-Bit Run jre7 (3).bat[/b] (This is also the only one that works for opening up the client the rest all get the -Xmx500m error). If I should be using something else let me know)
[IMG]http://i1157.photobucket.com/albums/p596/Jordanwagner92/Help.jpg[/img]
When I first started going to that it was saying something along the lines of " Windows can not find -Xmx500m. Which I know has something to do with the value of java and after a few searches I came to find that 500 is the average amount.
Anyways I went ahead and found this on the forums:
[IMG]http://i1157.photobucket.com/albums/p596/Jordanwagner92/Help2.jpg[/img]
I went ahead and followed those instructions was able to have the client window open up (Finally). Then came to find that between 0-7% it would freeze and white screen on me, while checking back to the forum pic above I deleted the cache after re-downloading it and then it would open up and say "Starting up" and white screen.
It's either something wrong with me or I may just be clueless and the server may just not be online, but as far as I know this server has been on since yesterday. (This is an old server I used to play about a year ago, Have been waiting for it to come back up).
ANY help is much appreciated, thank you!
The_Who

item.title: -Xmx500m error
item.dc:creator: @The_Who1 The_Who
item.description:
@The_Who1 wrote:

I have just downloaded a server and I’ve run into some problems.

In this one I go to: 64-Bit Run jre7 (3).bat (This is also the only one that works for opening up the client the rest all get the -Xmx500m error). If I should be using something else let me know)

Help.jpg1024×768

When I first started going to that it was saying something along the lines of " Windows can not find -Xmx500m. Which I know has something to do with the value of java and after a few searches I came to find that 500 is the average amount.

Anyways I went ahead and found this on the forums:

Help2.jpg1024×768

I went ahead and followed those instructions was able to have the client window open up (Finally). Then came to find that between 0-7% it would freeze and white screen on me, while checking back to the forum pic above I deleted the cache after re-downloading it and then it would open up and say “Starting up” and white screen.

It’s either something wrong with me or I may just be clueless and the server may just not be online, but as far as I know this server has been on since yesterday. (This is an old server I used to play about a year ago, Have been waiting for it to come back up).

ANY help is much appreciated, thank you!

The_Who
